trans-unit.source: Represents a serializable collection of service metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una raccolta serializzabile di metadati del servizio in formato XML.

trans-unit.source: The MetadataSet class contains a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects, each of which contains one dialect of metadata in XML form.
trans-unit.target: La classe MetadataSet contiene una raccolta di <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>oggetti, ognuno dei quali contiene un sottolinguaggio di metadati in formato XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the MetadataSet class is used to pass a group of XML metadata documents to and from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> objects, such as <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.
trans-unit.target: In genere, la classe MetadataSet viene utilizzata per passare a un gruppo di documenti di metadati XML da e verso <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter>oggetti, ad esempio <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter>e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataImporter> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter>

trans-unit.source: To create a MetadataSet from a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Per creare un MetadataSet da un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>oggetto di tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, utilizzare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A>costruttore.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: To obtain a <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> object of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere un <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>oggetto di tipo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection>, utilizzare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.MetadataSections%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> </xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601>

trans-unit.source: In addition, you can use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A> method to load a MetadataSet from XML data and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> method to write the internal metadata to an XML format.
trans-unit.target: Inoltre, è possibile utilizzare il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>per caricare un MetadataSet dai dati XML e <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A>metodo per scrivere i metadati interni in formato XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.WriteTo%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.ReadFrom%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type implements the structure defined in the WS-MetadataExchange specification.
trans-unit.target: Questo tipo implementa la struttura definita nella specifica WS-MetadataExchange.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>oggetto.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> class that contains the specified collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> classe che contiene la raccolta specificata di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from `sections`.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>da `sections`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The metadata values that the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> is to contain.
trans-unit.target: I valori di metadati che il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> da inserire.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> gli oggetti visualizzati nel formato serializzato di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"></xref> objects that appear in the serialized form of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Xml.XmlAttribute"> </xref> gli oggetti visualizzati nel formato serializzato di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una raccolta di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano i metadati.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"></xref> objects that represents the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Una raccolta di <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection"> </xref> gli oggetti che rappresentano i metadati.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> from the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> dall'oggetto specificato <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>oggetto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>da un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>oggetto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The reader to read in XML.
trans-unit.target: Il lettore per leggere in XML.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> that contains all the metadata present in the XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> che contiene tutti i metadati presenti nel flusso XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il lettore è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*> method to provide serialization support.
trans-unit.target: Implementa <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>metodo per fornire il supporto della serializzazione.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.GetSchema*>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> object that describes the XML representation of the object that is produced by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> method and accessed by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>oggetto che descrive la rappresentazione XML dell'oggetto generato dal <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23WriteXml%2A> (metodo) e a cui accede il <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet.System%23Xml%23Serialization%23IXmlSerializable%23ReadXml%2A> (metodo).</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*> method to support deserialization from XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>metodo per supportare la deserializzazione da XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.ReadXml*>

trans-unit.source: The reader to use when reading XML.
trans-unit.target: Lettore da utilizzare durante la lettura di XML.

trans-unit.source: The reader is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il lettore è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*> method to support serialization to XML.
trans-unit.target: Implementa il <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>metodo per supportare la serializzazione in XML.</xref:System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable.WriteXml*>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use when writing XML.
trans-unit.target: Writer da utilizzare durante la scrittura di XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il writer è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Writes the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"></xref> to XML using the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.
trans-unit.target: Scrive il <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet"> </xref> in XML utilizzando specificata <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Writes a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet> to an XML stream.
trans-unit.target: Scrive un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>in un flusso XML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSet>

trans-unit.source: The writer to use to write the XML.
trans-unit.target: Writer da utilizzare per scrivere il codice XML.

trans-unit.source: The writer is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il writer è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.
